sources.title: Ladies Courageous
sources.description: Title: Ladies Courageous Summary: The story of the Women's Auxiliary Ferrying Squadron, a unit of female pilots during WW II who flew bombers from the factories to their final destinations. Directed by: John Rawlins Actors: Loretta Young, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Diana Barrymore Production Company: Walter Wanger Productions Release Date: 1 February 1944 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The story of the Women's Auxiliary Ferrying Squadron, a unit of female pilots during WW II who flew bombers from the factories to their final destinations.

metadata.Plot: The story of the Women's Auxiliary Ferrying Squadron, a unit of female pilots during WW II who flew bombers from the factories to their final destinations.
metadata.Writer: Virginia Spencer Cowles, Doris Gilbert, Norman Reilly Raine
metadata.Actors: Loretta Young, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Diana Barrymore
